blog.name: baamarvels
blog.title: Yo
blog.description: BethAnnAngel/bethoftheblvd’s personal theories and place to put the majority of her marvels.

summary: Young Avengers Theory
body:
Young Avengers Theory

Avengers Endgame Spoilers below

.

.

.

.

.

Young avengers hear me out. So Harley was at the end of avengers Endgame. That random tall boy standing mysteriously, nobody knowing who he is. So hear me out. Harley becomes the new Iron Man or Iron Lad. And under the direction of New Cap as him, Peter and Cassie become the young avengers. Not right away, but after somewhere in MCU Spider-Man 3 timeline after Ant-Man 3 where Cassie becomes Stature like I don’t know how, but it’s going to happen. And then in a Cap Marvel storyline they can introduce Kamala Khan as miss marvel and she’ll be a young avenger and then Hawkeyes daughter is going to get better over time so she can be a young avenger unless they actually give us Kate Bishop.

Or

It’s going to wait till much later and they’re just going to reinstate Peter, Cassie, and Harley as avengers to replace the other avengers and then Spiderman will lead young avengers in the future with Hawkeye’s daughter or Kate Bishop and then Ms. Marvel in the future and including X-Men or Nova and whoever else!

.

.

.

.

.

Avengers Endgame Spoilers above

summary: Soooo this fic is basically heavily heavily inspired by a post by @angerydj !! I suggest you read it first, and if you’d like...
body:
Texts - greengreed - The Spectacular Spider-Man (Cartoon) [Archive of Our Own]

Soooo this fic is basically heavily heavily inspired by a post by @angerydj !! I suggest you read it first, and if you’d like to, here is the link. Anyway, yes, I did get permission! I did change some things up but it was mostly for my own ease because, as much as I love to write, I am a lazy ass writer. Nonetheless, enjoy. Instead of an edit, I attached a song I listened to while I wrote it, so enjoy that as well!!

Please also let me know if you’d like actual fics with chapters! I have two fics like that, but most are one-shots. I really like writing one-shots, mostly because I like fitting a little slice of life into one story. Let me know your opinions!

Summary:

Norman and Otto are separated for a little bit, as Otto is on a work trip to Alaska. Is the distance bad for the two of them, or will it end up being good for them? One things for sure, neither of them enjoy it.

Also, I started to use formatting in this story. I never have before. Let me know what you think!


Words:

2522

summary: it legit kills me to think peter was one of tony’s main motivations to want to try the time travel. that his first thought when...
body: it legit kills me to think peter was one of tony’s main motivations to want to try the time travel. that his first thought when he reunited with the others was “i lost the kid”. it kills me to think how happy he was when he saw peter again he almost couldnt believe it, and hugging him so dearly. peter telling him “please don’t go” was so heartwrenching to watch. it surely was sad and it brought me to tears but i was truly overwhelmed with joy of how much tony cared for peter like he was his own son and viceversa.

reblog.comment: it legit kills me to think peter was one of tony’s main motivations to want to try the time travel. that his first thought when he reunited with the others was “i lost the kid”. it kills me to think how happy he was when he saw peter again he almost couldnt believe it, and hugging him so dearly. peter telling him “please don’t go” was so heartwrenching to watch. it surely was sad and it brought me to tears but i was truly overwhelmed with joy of how much tony cared for peter like he was his own son and viceversa.

summary: I’m confused for one thing though. So when everyone came back, is it still five years later? I only ask because there’s Peter...
body: I’m confused for one thing though. So when everyone came back, is it still five years later? I only ask because there’s Peter back at school with Ned. Were all those kids snapped away? Or does Peter just continue school where he left off? Does that mean Ned was snapped away too?

summary:
so! i got a little adhd and anxiety spider-sense/powers theory!!
i mean, we all know peter is really hyperactive and has...
body:
so! i got a little adhd and anxiety spider-sense/powers theory!!

i mean, we all know peter is really hyperactive and has hyperfixations (star wars) and all that stuff but that’s not necessarily what i want to touch upon

i want to touch upon his spider senses. so, the thing with adhd is one of the current theories we have is that ADHD is carried down as a sort of survival instict that doesnt fare well in todays society. i want to say theory because im not sure its proven, nor that it’s the most recent study in adhd, but from what i remembered that was the case.

(a quick explanation of how adhd works in the brain!) i mean, our brains are always scanning for danger. but adhd kids are always ‘distracted’- because they’re focusing on the other stimuli around them. sound, touch, taste, sight. the brain is registering all of this information (and as all brains do, scanning for danger) which kind of causes that distractedness, jumping from one thing to the next type of vibe. its what causes the memory issues with adhd, because your working memory (consider it your brains ram- its what is the temporary memory storage before its stored Forever In Big Brain) can only hold seven things at once. and when youre taking in so much new information, those seven things get jumbled around a lot and don’t always get stored permanently.

so, to the point- i think that his enhanced senses and spider sense would definitely be affected by pre-existing adhd, and maybe cause a lot of adhd-like symptoms if not actually give him adhd if he didnt already have it.

he even makes a comment in civil war about how his visual input is too much, his senses are dialed to eleven, all that jazz. so we can see it’s clearly a distraction.

but if we move to the interesting part, his spider sense, i think that itd be cool to analyze that it works because the overactive mind is working to constantly scan for danger. so he’s taking in all the stimuli around him, and his brains combing through it before he can consciously process any threats. and since his brain will spot the danger before he does, it warns him! so, a survival instinct. not just some weird supernatural phenomena.

id also like to point out how anxiety would play into the spider sense- since in this, it’s not a supernatural phenomena, i think it’s safe to say if you have anxiety you’re fucked. because your brain isn’t making moral decisions on whether something is dangerous or not on it’s own conciousness, judging right from wrong perfeftly. it’s taking what you would believe to be a threat and telling you that it’s a threat. so anything you’d catch naturally without a spider sense, imagine that being… ten times worse.

anyways its just a little thing!!

reblog.comment:
so! i got a little adhd and anxiety spider-sense/powers theory!!

i mean, we all know peter is really hyperactive and has hyperfixations (star wars) and all that stuff but that’s not necessarily what i want to touch upon

i want to touch upon his spider senses. so, the thing with adhd is one of the current theories we have is that ADHD is carried down as a sort of survival instict that doesnt fare well in todays society. i want to say theory because im not sure its proven, nor that it’s the most recent study in adhd, but from what i remembered that was the case.

(a quick explanation of how adhd works in the brain!) i mean, our brains are always scanning for danger. but adhd kids are always ‘distracted’- because they’re focusing on the other stimuli around them. sound, touch, taste, sight. the brain is registering all of this information (and as all brains do, scanning for danger) which kind of causes that distractedness, jumping from one thing to the next type of vibe. its what causes the memory issues with adhd, because your working memory (consider it your brains ram- its what is the temporary memory storage before its stored Forever In Big Brain) can only hold seven things at once. and when youre taking in so much new information, those seven things get jumbled around a lot and don’t always get stored permanently.

so, to the point- i think that his enhanced senses and spider sense would definitely be affected by pre-existing adhd, and maybe cause a lot of adhd-like symptoms if not actually give him adhd if he didnt already have it.

he even makes a comment in civil war about how his visual input is too much, his senses are dialed to eleven, all that jazz. so we can see it’s clearly a distraction.

but if we move to the interesting part, his spider sense, i think that itd be cool to analyze that it works because the overactive mind is working to constantly scan for danger. so he’s taking in all the stimuli around him, and his brains combing through it before he can consciously process any threats. and since his brain will spot the danger before he does, it warns him! so, a survival instinct. not just some weird supernatural phenomena.

id also like to point out how anxiety would play into the spider sense- since in this, it’s not a supernatural phenomena, i think it’s safe to say if you have anxiety you’re fucked. because your brain isn’t making moral decisions on whether something is dangerous or not on it’s own conciousness, judging right from wrong perfeftly. it’s taking what you would believe to be a threat and telling you that it’s a threat. so anything you’d catch naturally without a spider sense, imagine that being… ten times worse.

anyways its just a little thing!!
